pages.text: The $(mob)Zombie$() is a common monster that spawns in dark places in the $(thing)Overworld$(), including the surface at night. It tries to get in melee range to attack its target, which are both players and $(l:minecraft_villager)$(mob)Villagers$(). It is quite slow and burns when exposed to sunlight.$(p)A $(mob)Zombie$() may spawn wearing armor or weapons, making it tougher and protecting it from sunlight if it wears a helmet.
$(mob)Zombies$() drop $(item)Rotten Flesh$() on death. It can be eaten in an emergency, but it will often deteriorate the eater's hunger after being consumed.
